PlayerPackage

Class RecordDriver

  • java.lang.Object
    • PlayerPackage.RecordDriver

  • public class RecordDriver
extends java.lang.Object
    The RecordDriver class contains methods for accessing both Record objects and CareerRecord objects. It can update records as well as read from them and sum up total records for any given player.
    Author:
    Aidan Petit

        public PlayerPackage.Record getPvPRecord(java.lang.String p1,
                                java.lang.String p2)
                                  throws java.io.EOFException
        Finds the record object which contains the match history between the two input players.
        Parameters:
        p1 - Player 1
        p2 - Player 2
        Returns:
        The record object corresponding to their game history
        Throws:
        java.io.EOFException - There is no history between the two players

      • checkForRecord

        public boolean checkForRecord(java.lang.String p1,

        Checks that the players have played before to avoid reading from a null file
        Parameters:
        p1 - Player 1
        p2 - Player 1
        Returns:
        true The two players have played each other before false The two players have not played each other before
